Package com.googlecode.aluminumproject.templates

Interface Summary
ActionContext The context in which an action is created and executed.
ActionElement A template element that executes an action.
ExpressionElement A template element that evaluates an expression and writes the result to the writer.
Template A template.
TemplateElement A part of a template.
TemplateElementFactory Used by parsers to create various kinds of template elements.
TextElement A template element that writes text to the writer.
 

Class Summary
AbstractTemplateElement Minimises the effort it takes to implement the template element interface.
ActionContributionDescriptor Describes an action contribution.
DefaultActionContext The action context implementation that is used by the default action element.
DefaultActionElement The default action element implementation.
DefaultExpressionElement The default expression element implementation.
DefaultTemplateElementFactory A template element factory that creates default template elements.
DefaultTextElement The default text element implementation.
TemplateBuilder Builds a template.
TemplateContext The current state of a template.
TemplateProcessor Processes a single template.
 

Enum Summary
ActionPhase The life cycle of an action.
 

Exception Summary
TemplateException Thrown by a template element when something goes wrong while processing it.
